EmailTemplate.name: Quickbooks Training Menu
EmailTemplate.subject: QuickBooks Enterprise: Training Menu
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Account #{!Contact.CAN__c}
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
You’re allotted unlimited (1 hour) QuickBooks training sessions that will be 1-on-1 with an Enterprise Expert during the Onboarding Program. We’ve developed nine different offerings and one session that would be completely driven by whatever questions you bring. Take a look below and let me know where you’d prefer to start. My team typically needs a 24 hour notice prior to scheduling the training, all courses are an hour long, and scheduled on the hour between 7:00 AM – 3:00 PM (Pacific Time), Monday through Friday.
New to QuickBooks • How to Create a Company File • Users and Permissions • Preferences • Highlight of Centers • Basic and Advanced Navigation • Templates and Forms • Email Setup • Everything Enterprise website
New Features • What’s new in 2016 • Damage Control Plans • Data Damage • Shortcut Keys • Tips and Tricks • Recommended Maintenance • Differences in Bank Feeds
Purchasing and Sales • Customer and Vendor Center • Basic A/P Workflow • The Bill Tracker • Basic A/R Workflow • The Income Tracker • Sales Reps • Form Customization • Sales Tax Setup • Additional Purchasing and Sales Utilities/Tools
Advanced Purchasing and Sales • Class Tracking • Multiple Currencies • Transaction Templates and Forms • Vendor Refunds • Prepaid Expenses • Upfront Deposits • Wash Accounts • Transferring Credits • Job Costing • Bad Debt • Price levels • Advanced Pricing/Price Rules (Platinum Edition) • Paying/Adjusting Sales Tax
Reconciliation and Online Banking • Checks and Credit Card Charges • Deposits • Bank and Credit Card Reconciliations • Setup and Use of Online Banking • Loan Manager • Accountant Tools
Inventory • Item Basics • Inventory Reports • Inventory Item Setup • Inventory Assembly Setup • Custom Field Overview • Receiving and Selling Inventory • Inventory Adjustments • Enhanced Inventory Receiving • Advanced Inventory (Platinum Edition) o Multiple Inventory Sites o Barcodes o Serial and Lot Numbers o FIFO
Reporting • Enterprise Solutions Default Reports • Types of Reports • Job Costing Reports • Basic Report Customization • The Report Center and Memorized Reports • Company Snapshot and Insights • Combined Reports and • QuickBooks Statement Writer • Troubleshooting Reports • Using the Audit Trail • ODBC
QuickBooks Advanced Reporting • Advanced reporting support expectations • Advanced Reporting Resources • Install • Setting up Users for Advanced Reporting • Advanced Reporting Demo
Payroll (Gold and Platinum Editions) • Ensure DIY Payroll is available • Using the Payroll Setup Wizard • Payroll Items • Sick and Vacation Time • Setup Employees • Year-to-Date (YTD) Adjustments • Commission • Payroll Schedules • Workman’s Compensation • Create Paychecks • Liabilities • Job Costing and Time Tracking • Reporting • Leave of Absence/Termination • E-filing
Q & A Session • Client Driven Subject Matter
I look forward to working with you.
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} | Enterprise Account Manager Work Phone: {!User.Phone} ext {!User.Extension} | {!User.Email}
Intuit | simplify the business of life
This transmittal is intended only for the use of the individual or entity to which it is addressed and may contain information that is privileged, confidential and exempt from disclosure under applicable law. If the reader of this transmittal is not the intended recipient or the employee or agent responsible for delivering the transmittal to the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that any dissemination, distribution or copying of this communication is strictly prohibited.
